sql.if: CUST_ID, CUST_NO, CUST_NAME, CUST_REGION, CUST_MANAGER_ID, CUST_MANAGER_NAME, CUST_LEVEL, CUST_LEVEL_LABEL, CUST_SATISFY, CUST_CREDIT, CUST_ADDR, CUST_ZIP, CUST_TEL, CUST_FAX, CUST_WEBSITE, CUST_LICENCE_NO, CUST_CHIEFTAIN, CUST_BANKROLL, CUST_TURNOVER, CUST_BANK, CUST_BANK_ACCOUNT, CUST_LOCAL_TAX_NO, CUST_NATIONAL_TAX_NO, CUST_STATUS

mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CST_CUSTOMER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CST_CUSTOMER (CUST_ID, CUST_NO, CUST_NAME, CUST_REGION, CUST_MANAGER_ID, CUST_MANAGER_NAME, CUST_LEVEL, CUST_LEVEL_LABEL, CUST_SATISFY, CUST_CREDIT, CUST_ADDR, CUST_ZIP, CUST_TEL, CUST_FAX, CUST_WEBSITE, CUST_LICENCE_NO, CUST_CHIEFTAIN, CUST_BANKROLL, CUST_TURNOVER, CUST_BANK, CUST_BANK_ACCOUNT, CUST_LOCAL_TAX_NO, CUST_NATIONAL_TAX_NO, CUST_STATUS ) values (#{custId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custManagerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custLevelLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custSatisfy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custZip,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custLicenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custChieftain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custBankroll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custTurnover,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custLocalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNationalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} )

update CST_CUSTOMER
CUST_ID = #{record.custId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUST_NO = #{record.custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NAME = #{record.custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_REGION = #{record.custRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CST_CUSTOMER
CUST_NO = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_REGION = #{custRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_MANAGER_ID = #{custManagerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

CUST_NATIONAL_TAX_NO = #{custNationalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
where CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update CST_CUSTOMER set CUST_NO = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_REGION = #{custRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_MANAGER_ID = #{custManagerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUST_MANAGER_NAME = #{custManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_LEVEL = #{custLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUST_LEVEL_LABEL = #{custLevelLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_SATISFY = #{custSatisfy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUST_CREDIT = #{custCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUST_ADDR = #{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_ZIP = #{custZip,jdbcType=CHAR}, CUST_TEL = #{custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_FAX = #{custFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_WEBSITE = #{custWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_LICENCE_NO = #{custLicenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_CHIEFTAIN = #{custChieftain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_BANKROLL = #{custBankroll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUST_TURNOVER = #{custTurnover,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUST_BANK = #{custBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_BANK_ACCOUNT = #{custBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_LOCAL_TAX_NO = #{custLocalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_NATIONAL_TAX_NO = #{custNationalTaxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_STATUS = #{custStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} where CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
